rule: If "CantAnswer" is chosen as the output, it must never signify the chatbot was unable to process; instead, it must imply a specific reason for failure.
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag, 'NN', which is present in the list of allowed part-of-speech tags provided in the description. The output adheres to the requirement of returning only the part-of-speech tag.
OK
